resources.string: Rādhānāth Swāmi Lectures and Kirtans App

Radhānātha Swāmi Lectures & Kirtans App is collection of kirtans, Vaishnava Bhajans and lectures on Bhagavad Gita, Srimada Bhagavatam, Chaitanya Charitamrita, Brihad Bhagavatamrita, Glories of Acharyas and more by His Holiness Radhanatha Swami Maharaja.\n Radhānātha Swāmi is a Vaishnava sanyassi (a monk in a Krishna-bhakti lineage) connecte to ISKCON and teacher of the devotional path of Bhakti-yoga. He is author of The Journey Home, a memoir of his search for spiritual truth, and the New York Times bestseller The Journey Within.
With Rādhānāth Swāmi Lectures and Kirtans App, you have access to vast collection of His Holiness Rādhānāth Swāmi\'s lectures and kirtans, Śrīla Prabhupāda\'s Books, Śrīla Prabhupāda\'s daily quotes.
